Package org.apache.openjpa.persistence.jest

Interface JSON

All Known Implementing Classes:
JSONObject, JSONObject.Array, JSONObject.KVMap
public interface JSON
A generic interface for a JSON encoded instance.
Author:
Pinaki Poddar
